resources.string: CoronaVirus2
ADVICE
How to protect yourself and others on a daily basis?
Respect social distancing measures as much as possible.
Wear a mask.
Limit social interactions, some people transmit the virus without noticing symptoms.
Wash your hands very regularly.
Cough or sneeze into your elbow or a tissue.
Use a disposable tissue and throw it away..
Greet without shaking hands, do not kiss anyone.
Test
Information

This is an application which helps the operator to know if he shows signs of a Corona virus virus and causes symptoms by filling out a form after that it tells you if you have symptoms of this virus or not.
Start the test
What was your warmest temperature in the past 48 hours?
In the past few days, have you had a cough or has your usual cough changed?
In the past few days, have you noticed a loss or a sharp decrease in your taste or smell?
In the past few days, have you had a sore throat and / or unusual muscle aches and / or body aches and / or unusual headaches?
Have you had unusual fatigue in the past few days?
For 24 hours or more, have you been unable to eat or drink?
In the past 24 hours, have you noticed any unusual shortness of breath when speaking or making a little effort?
Do you have unbalanced diabetes or with complications (eyes, kidneys)?
Are you a pregnant woman in the 3rd trimester of your pregnancy?
Do you have cirrhosis?
Finish
